name: Ragdoll Smash: Collection of Randomness
description:
This is an expanded version of a Ragdoll Smash made for a 12 hour hackathon https://watt-tech.itch.io/ragdoll-smash.

This is a 4 local multiplayer game so here are the controls (works with controllers too.)

Player 1: a, d, space, s, left shift

Player 2: left, right, up, down, right shift

Player 3: [Number pad] 1, 3, 5, 2, enter

Player 4: j, l, i, k, b

Use R to restart if necessary.
